text: …babamın ve atalarımın şerefi için gereğini yaptım ana.
english: for the honor of my father and my ancestors, mother."

text: Sen babamı öldürüp, beni de Sadeddin’in hizmetkârı kıldın.
english: You killed my father and made me Sadeddin's servant.
Now it's either Sadeddin or me.

text: Ya devlet ya oluk oluk kan.
english: Either the state or rivers of blood.

text: Bunun ötesi berisi yoktur. Gayrı bu yoldan dönüş de yoktur.
english: There's nothing more to it than this. There is no turning back from this path now.
My lord, Artuk Bey has arrived. There is

text: Yanında da biri vardır. Kimdir bilmem.
english: someone else with him. I don't know who he/she is. I told

text: Ona çok mühim bir şey olmadığı sürece buraya gelmemesini söylemiştim.
english: her not to come here unless it was something very important .

text: Yanında biriyle geldiğine göre itimat ettiği biridir.
english: Since he came with someone, it must be someone he trusts.
Assalamu alaikum, Mr. Ertuğrul. Wa alaikum assalam

text: Artuk Bey olanlardan bahsetti. Başınız sağ olsun.
english: Artuk Bey talked about what happened. My condolences.
I am Hüsamettin Karaca, the Emir of Sivas.
Since you've taken the trouble to come all this way... it

text: …mühim bir şey olsa gerek Hüsamettin Bey.
english: must be something important, Mr. Hüsamettin.
I have come on the special order of our Sultan. Is this at the
This is Emir Sadeddin's death warrant.

text: Sultanımıza yazdığın mektupta istediğin vazife ikimize verildi, Ertuğrul Bey.
english: you requested in your letter to our Sultan has been given to both of us, Ertuğrul Bey.
We will pull the leash on Sadeddin Köpek together.

text: Sonunda sultan hayırlı olan kararı verdi demek.
english: It means the sultan finally made the right decision.

text: Sadeddin Köpek, sultanımızın Amid seferini durdurup…
english: Sadeddin Köpek halted our sultan's Amid campaign and...
...set out on a campaign to Samsat Castle himself .
Our Sultan knowingly sent him on the expedition.
We'll set a trap for him when he returns from his trip.

text: Yanında ona sadık olan ve muzaffer olan bir orduyla dönecek.
english: He will return with an army loyal to him and victorious. We

text: Bunun için hazırlık yapmamız icap eder.
Köpek sefer dönüşü Sivas’a uğrayacak. Onu orada bekleyeceğiz.
english: The dog will stop in Sivas on its way back from the trip. We'll wait for him there. First,

text: …sonra hiç beklemediği bir vakitte işini bitireceğiz.
english: ...and then, at a time he least expects it, we'll finish the job.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) Ey Şah, bin yıl vardır ki...
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) O Shah, for a thousand years...
...the world has not seen anyone like me.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) Onun bunun arsasına yerleştirdin beni bunca vakit.
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) You've been placing me in other people's lands all this time.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) Senin meclisin bir ummandır kesinlikle.
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) Your assembly is truly an ocean.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) Heyhat ummanda inciler dipte, çöpler yukarıda olur.
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) Alas, in the ocean, pearls are at the bottom, and trash is at the top.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) Sen bunu göremedin. İmdi saltanat vaktidir.
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) You couldn't see that. Now is the time for reign.

text: (Sadeddin iç ses) İmdi dipteki nadide incinin vaktidir.
english: (Sadeddin's inner voice) Now is the time for the rare pearl at the bottom.

text: Samsat seferine çıkmak için hazırız Emir Hazretleri.
english: We are ready to embark on the Samsat expedition, Your Highness.
Your army is waiting to meet you. May
(All together) May your victories be everlasting.
Run to your death, Sadeddin Köpek.

text: Devlet erkânında Köpek’e karşı olan kim varsa…
english: Anyone in the government who opposes the Dog…
…we need to meet with them one by one. They must support us

text: Hem Köpek ölene kadar bize destek olmalılar…
…hem de Köpek öldükten sonra devletin içinde nizamı sağlamalılar.
english: … and after the dog dies, they must maintain order within the state.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, onlar da Köpek’in korkusundan sinmiş vaziyetteler.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, they too are cowering in fear of Köpek.

text: Ayağa kalkmak için bir kıvılcım beklerler.
english: They wait for a spark to ignite their urge to rise.

text: Eğer onlara güç ve umut verirsek…
english: If we give them strength and hope… they
will take on this task myself.

text: Köpek’e karşı olan kim varsa herkesi safımıza çekeceğim.
english: I will bring everyone who opposes the Dog to our side.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, bu bizim tek imkânımız.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, this is our only option.

text: Bu yolun sonunda ya Köpek’in kanı dökülecek…
english: At the end of this road, either the Dog's blood will be spilled...
...or the Dog will shed a lot of blood. So then…
the state is waiting for our help.

text: Ben Sivas’a giderim. Askerlerim beni bekler.
english: I'm going to Sivas. My soldiers are waiting for me. May
God not let us be ashamed. -Amine.
but we are embarking on a blessed journey.

text: Gayrı zorlu lakin sonu hayırlı bir vazife bizi bekler.
english: A challenging but ultimately rewarding task awaits us. The time has come to sever the head
of the snake that has sunk its fangs into our state

text: Bu görklü devleti kurtarmak yalnız bizim elimizdedir.
english: Saving this glorious nation is in our hands alone.
Our goal and our message are one and the same. For
the survival of the state, for the safety of our homeland… …
Come on, brave men, may our campaign be blessed.
